app.title: Feline Tales
progress.message.3: Paw by paw, the story takes shape...
progress.message.5: The writer just changed the ending...
progress.message.6: The cat painter is dipping their tail in paint to create the illustration...
progress.message.7: Professional narrator is analyzing the script...
progress.message.8: Story requires review by the lodge of cat critics...
progress.message.9: One last stretch and it's ready... Purrr...
progress.message.10: There it is! Sending by pigeon mail...
